subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tim Howard saved two shots against his former team, leading Everton to a 4-2 shootout victory against Manchester United and its first F.A. Cup final in 14 years. After the teams played to a 0-0 draw, Howard stopped Dimitar Berbatov and Rio Ferdinand.
